article_title: How AmSurg's Doctor Bid Helps Health Insurers Battle Antitrust Concerns

article_metadata.description: News that surgery center operator and physician services firm AmSurg Corp. (AMSG) wants to buy rival Team Health Holdings (TMH) and grow its doctor network into a national powerhouse is designed in part to gain leverage for providers of medical care against health insurance companies. And that may help several health [...]
